Title: Black farmers among those left in limbo amid federal funding freeze
Description:
The federal government has historically discriminated against Black farmers.
The recent funding halt from the Trump administration presents yet another hurdle to those who have spent decades fighting for equity in farming.

Title: How Trump's tariffs on steel and aluminum could hit you at the grocery store
Description:
U.S.
tariffs could cause the prices of steel and aluminum cans to rise, an increase that may ultimately be passed on to consumers.

Title: First known cookbook by a Black American woman gets new edition 160 years later
Description:
Malinda Russell's A Domestic Cookbook was first published in 1866.
It contains least a hundred recipes for sweets, plus recipes for shampoo and cologne – and remedies for toothaches.

Title: Palantir CEO Calls for Tech Patriotism, Warns of AI Warfare
Description:

defense capabilities.

Title: Satya Nadella explains why Microsoft's quantum 'breakthrough' is so important
Description: Microsoft on Wednesday unveiled its new Majorana 1 chip, which Satya Nadella described as a "breakthrough" in quantum computing.

Title: Luigi Mangione was mad about something bigger than healthcare
Description:
The manifesto found after the UnitedHealthcare shooting doesn't gripe about insurance.
It rails against monopolies.

Title: Christina Haack's ex-husband Ant Anstead appeared on her HGTV show 'The Flip Off.' Here's a timeline of their relationship.
Description:
Christina Haack and Ant Anstead got married in 2018 and separated in 2020.
On Wednesday, they reunited on HGTV's "The Flip Off."

Title: LeBron, Luka say roles in clutch go 'both ways'
Description: LeBron James missed two potential game-tying 3-pointers in the waning seconds of Wednesday night's loss to the Hornets, but Luka Doncic said their roles in clutch situations are interchangeable.

Title: ★ Thoughts and Observations on Today’s iPhone 16e Announcement
Description: The iPhone 16e is arguably just plain a better phone than the iPhone 15, and I think it’s almost inarguably a better value at $100 less.

Title: Star Wars-Style Fog Collectors Could Provide Water to the World’s Driest Cities
Description: Researchers in Chile have shown that fog collectors could supply enough water each week for 10,000 people living in a desert community.

Title: A Terrible Milestone in the American Presidency
Description: Trump switches sides in the war for freedom.

Title: 'Grave robbers took my daughter's cross and my mother's - twice'

Description:

Title: Surprising Chimpanzee Signal Reveals Secrets of Ape Communication
